name: Defense Evasion - Multiple Suspicious Events (Threshold Correlation)
description: Threshold rule: trigger when a host produces 3 or more defense-evasion related events within 5 minutes (examples: event log clear, encoded PowerShell, LOLBIN execution). Adjust threshold and window for tuning.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: (winlog.event_id:1102) OR (process.name:powershell.exe AND process.args:(*-EncodedCommand* OR *-nop*)) OR process.name:(regsvr32.exe OR certutil.exe OR mshta.exe OR rundll32.exe) OR process.args:("sc stop" OR "net stop" OR "Stop-Service")
